name: A Surprise from the Depths
description:
Don't Starve! You are a kraken who needs to eat. Surprise these sailors and devour them. Created for the Jingle Jam Game Jam 2020

Controls:

Mouse to move, Space to eat

Home to cheat.

Made with Unity 2019.4

Unfortunately a lot of content is missing due to issues with web gl such as more ships, towers and mines
